description:
*** This is a w2 position NO C2C ***
Must-Haves: - 2 years of recruiting experience - Strong attention to detail and accuracy - Excellent verbal and written communication skills - Ability to manage multiple candidates simultaneously at various recruitment stages - Strong proficiency with computers and databases, including Microsoft Office Applications (Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint) Preferred: - Familiarity with applicant tracking systems (ATS); iCIMS and UltiPro experience - SHRM CP/SCP - PHR/SPHR Day-to-Day: This recruiter is tasked with designing and implementing effective recruiting strategies to secure top talent across all divisions. This role requires collaboration with Hiring Managers, HR Business Partners, Campus Programs, and the Diversity & Inclusion group. - Identify recruiting needs by meeting with managers and studying organizational plans - Develop applicant sources through outreach to community services, colleges, agencies, recruiters, media, and online platforms - Assess applicant qualifications via interviews, reference checks, and qualification comparisons - Coordinate management interviews, including scheduling and travel arrangements - Manage candidate experience by handling job postings, descriptions, and requirements in iCIMS - Facilitate the offer process and negotiate employment terms
responsibilities:
This recruiter is tasked with designing and implementing effective recruiting strategies to secure top talent across all divisions. This role requires collaboration with Hiring Managers, HR Business Partners, Campus Programs, and the Diversity & Inclusion group.

- Identify recruiting needs by meeting with managers and studying organizational plans
- Develop applicant sources through outreach to community services, colleges, agencies, recruiters, media, and online platforms
- Assess applicant qualifications via interviews, reference checks, and qualification comparisons
- Coordinate management interviews, including scheduling and travel arrangements
- Manage candidate experience by handling job postings, descriptions, and requirements in iCIMS
- Facilitate the offer process and negotiate employment terms

qualifications.required: 2 years of recruiting experience, Strong attention to detail and accuracy, Excellent verbal and written communication skills, Ability to manage multiple candidates simultaneously at various recruitment stages, Strong proficiency with computers and databases, including Microsoft Office Applications (Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
qualifications.preferred: Familiarity with applicant tracking systems (ATS); iCIMS and UltiPro experience, SHRM CP/SCP, PHR/SPHR

benefits: Medical insurance, Vision insurance, Dental insurance, 401(k)
